item.description:
Planned Parenthood is trying to open an office in Fitchburg.

They are already getting a lot of resistance. Protests have already started on Main Street.

Planned Parenthood needs your support.

If you're a Fitchburg constituent, please come to Fitchburg City Hall by 6:30pm on Tuesday, February 2nd. Tell your family and friends who reside in Fitchburg to come out as residents who support the many services Planned Parenthood supplies. They've asked for as many people to come and support them as posible.

Planned Parenthood has stated that they aren't looking for counter-protesters.

GWH contact is Chris Lackey: 978-400-6993
Planned Parenthood contact is Amanda Morse: 617-629-8613
item.name: Attention Fitchburg Constituents & GWH: Planned Parenthood Needs Your Support
